verses.verse: And the word <WH1697> of the LORD <WH3068> came unto me, saying <WH559>,

Son <WH1121> of man <WH120>, prophesy <WH5012> against the shepherds <WH7462> of Israel <WH3478>, prophesy <WH5012>, and say <WH559> unto them, Thus saith <WH559> the Lord <WH136> GOD <WH3069> unto the shepherds <WH7462>; Woe <WH1945> be to the shepherds <WH7462> of Israel <WH3478> that do feed <WH7462> themselves! should not the shepherds <WH7462> feed <WH7462> the flocks <WH6629>?
Ye eat <WH398> the fat <WH2459>, and ye clothe <WH3847> you with the wool <WH6785>, ye kill <WH2076> them that are fed <WH1277>: but ye feed <WH7462> not the flock <WH6629>.

The diseased <WH2470> have ye not strengthened <WH2388>, neither have ye healed <WH7495> that which was sick <WH2470>, neither have ye bound up <WH2280> that which was broken <WH7665>, neither have ye brought again <WH7725> that which was driven away <WH5080>, neither have ye sought <WH1245> that which was lost <WH6>; but with force <WH2394> and with cruelty <WH6531> have ye ruled <WH7287> them.
And they were scattered <WH6327>, because there is no shepherd <WH7462>: and they became meat <WH402> to all the beasts <WH2416> of the field <WH7704>, when they were scattered <WH6327>.

My sheep <WH6629> wandered <WH7686> through all the mountains <WH2022>, and upon every high <WH7311> hill <WH1389>: yea, my flock <WH6629> was scattered <WH6327> upon all the face <WH6440> of the earth <WH776>, and none did search <WH1875> or seek <WH1245> after them.
¶ Therefore, ye shepherds <WH7462>, hear <WH8085> the word <WH1697> of the LORD <WH3068>;

As I live <WH2416>, saith <WH5002> the Lord <WH136> GOD <WH3069>, surely because my flock <WH6629> became a prey <WH957>, and my flock <WH6629> became meat <WH402> to every beast <WH2416> of the field <WH7704>, because there was no shepherd <WH7462>, neither did my shepherds <WH7462> search <WH1875> for my flock <WH6629>, but the shepherds <WH7462> fed <WH7462> themselves, and fed <WH7462> not my flock <WH6629>;
Therefore, O ye shepherds <WH7462>, hear <WH8085> the word <WH1697> of the LORD <WH3068>;

Thus saith <WH559> the Lord <WH136> GOD <WH3069>; Behold, I am against the shepherds <WH7462>; and I will require <WH1875> my flock <WH6629> at their hand <WH3027>, and cause them to cease <WH7673> from feeding <WH7462> the flock <WH6629>; neither shall the shepherds <WH7462> feed <WH7462> themselves any more; for I will deliver <WH5337> my flock <WH6629> from their mouth <WH6310>, that they may not be meat <WH402> for them.
¶ For thus saith <WH559> the Lord <WH136> GOD <WH3069>; Behold, I, even I, will both search <WH1875> my sheep <WH6629>, and seek them out <WH1239>.

As a shepherd <WH7462> seeketh out <WH1243> his flock <WH5739> in the day <WH3117> that he is among <WH8432> his sheep <WH6629> that are scattered <WH6567>; so will I seek out <WH1239> my sheep <WH6629>, and will deliver <WH5337> them out of all places <WH4725> where they have been scattered <WH6327> in the cloudy <WH6051> and dark <WH6205> day <WH3117>.

And I will bring them out <WH3318> from the people <WH5971>, and gather <WH6908> them from the countries <WH776>, and will bring <WH935> them to their own land <WH127>, and feed <WH7462> them upon the mountains <WH2022> of Israel <WH3478> by the rivers <WH650>, and in all the inhabited places <WH4186> of the country <WH776>.

I will feed <WH7462> them in a good <WH2896> pasture <WH4829>, and upon the high <WH4791> mountains <WH2022> of Israel <WH3478> shall their fold <WH5116> be: there shall they lie <WH7257> in a good <WH2896> fold <WH5116>, and in a fat <WH8082> pasture <WH4829> shall they feed <WH7462> upon the mountains <WH2022> of Israel <WH3478>.
I will feed <WH7462> my flock <WH6629>, and I will cause them to lie down <WH7257>, saith <WH5002> the Lord <WH136> GOD <WH3069>.

I will seek <WH1245> that which was lost <WH6>, and bring again <WH7725> that which was driven away <WH5080>, and will bind up <WH2280> that which was broken <WH7665>, and will strengthen <WH2388> that which was sick <WH2470>: but I will destroy <WH8045> the fat <WH8082> and the strong <WH2389>; I will feed <WH7462> them with judgment <WH4941>.

And as for you <WH859>, O my flock <WH6629>, thus saith <WH559> the Lord <WH136> GOD <WH3069>; Behold, I judge <WH8199> between cattle <WH7716> and cattle <WH7716>, between the rams <WH352> and the he goats <WH6260>.

Seemeth it a small thing <WH4592> unto you to have eaten up <WH7462> the good <WH2896> pasture <WH4829>, but ye must tread down <WH7429> with your feet <WH7272> the residue <WH3499> of your pastures <WH4829>? and to have drunk <WH8354> of the deep <WH4950> waters <WH4325>, but ye must foul <WH7515> the residue <WH3498> with your feet <WH7272>?
And as for my flock <WH6629>, they eat <WH7462> that which ye have trodden <WH4823> with your feet <WH7272>; and they drink <WH8354> that which ye have fouled <WH4833> with your feet <WH7272>.
¶ Therefore thus saith <WH559> the Lord <WH136> GOD <WH3069> unto them; Behold, I, even I, will judge <WH8199> between the fat <WH1274> cattle <WH7716> and between the lean <WH7330> cattle <WH7716>.

Because ye have thrust <WH1920> with side <WH6654> and with shoulder <WH3802>, and pushed <WH5055> all the diseased <WH2470> with your horns <WH7161>, till ye have scattered <WH6327> them abroad <WH2351>;
Therefore will I save <WH3467> my flock <WH6629>, and they shall no more be a prey <WH957>; and I will judge <WH8199> between cattle <WH7716> and cattle <WH7716>.

And I will set up <WH6965> one <WH259> shepherd <WH7462> over them, and he shall feed <WH7462> them, even my servant <WH5650> David <WH1732>; he shall feed <WH7462> them, and he shall be their shepherd <WH7462>.
And I the LORD <WH3068> will be their God <WH430>, and my servant <WH5650> David <WH1732> a prince <WH5387> among <WH8432> them; I the LORD <WH3068> have spoken <WH1696> it.

And I will make <WH3772> with them a covenant <WH1285> of peace <WH7965>, and will cause the evil <WH7451> beasts <WH2416> to cease <WH7673> out of the land <WH776>: and they shall dwell <WH3427> safely <WH983> in the wilderness <WH4057>, and sleep <WH3462> in the woods <WH3293> <WH3264>.

And I will make <WH5414> them and the places round about <WH5439> my hill <WH1389> a blessing <WH1293>; and I will cause the shower <WH1653> to come down <WH3381> in his season <WH6256>; there shall be showers <WH1653> of blessing <WH1293>.

And the tree <WH6086> of the field <WH7704> shall yield <WH5414> her fruit <WH6529>, and the earth <WH776> shall yield <WH5414> her increase <WH2981>, and they shall be safe <WH983> in their land <WH127>, and shall know <WH3045> that I am the LORD <WH3068>, when I have broken <WH7665> the bands <WH4133> of their yoke <WH5923>, and delivered <WH5337> them out of the hand <WH3027> of those that served <WH5647> themselves of them.

And they shall no more be a prey <WH957> to the heathen <WH1471>, neither shall the beast <WH2416> of the land <WH776> devour <WH398> them; but they shall dwell <WH3427> safely <WH983>, and none shall make them afraid <WH2729>.

And I will raise up <WH6965> for them a plant <WH4302> of renown <WH8034>, and they shall be no more consumed <WH622> with hunger <WH7458> in the land <WH776>, neither bear <WH5375> the shame <WH3639> of the heathen <WH1471> any more.

Thus shall they know <WH3045> that I the LORD <WH3068> their God <WH430> am with them, and that they, even the house <WH1004> of Israel <WH3478>, are my people <WH5971>, saith <WH5002> the Lord <WH136> GOD <WH3069>.
And ye <WH859> my flock <WH6629>, the flock <WH6629> of my pasture <WH4830>, are men <WH120>, and I am your God <WH430>, saith <WH5002> the Lord <WH136> GOD <WH3069>.
